Building Excellence Since 1964

Your Trusted Partner in Civil Construction.

Welcome to Mehra Group, a legacy of over five decades in the world of civil construction. We've been at the forefront of shaping infrastructure and delivering quality projects. Our commitment to excellence is the cornerstone of our success.

Our Diverse Business Segments

Explore the breadth of our expertise, from civil construction to commercial real estate. Discover how Mehra Group excels in a variety of business sectors, delivering quality, innovation, and reliability across all segments.

Road & Highway Development

Mehra Group is a trusted leader in road and highway development, specializing in the construction of state and national highways. Our portfolio boasts successful road and bridge projects, showcasing our commitment to quality and timely delivery.

Irrigation Construction

Mehra Group's legacy includes significant contributions to irrigation construction, with a focus on canals, dams, and related infrastructure. We play a vital role in enhancing agricultural and water resource development.

Building Construction

Experience excellence in building construction with Mehra Group. Our dedicated team constructs residential, commercial, and institutional buildings that stand as testaments to quality craftsmanship and architectural finesse.

Real Estate Development

Explore Mehra Group's foray into real estate development, where we specialize in land purchase, development, and sales. Our commitment to 'Housing for All' resonates in every project we undertake.

Water & Sewage Construction

At Mehra Group, we excel in water and sewage construction, providing essential infrastructure solutions. Our expertise extends to sewage systems, ensuring efficient and sustainable water management.

Our Journey

Since 1964, Mehra Group has been synonymous with excellence in civil construction. Founded by the visionary Late Shri Mahendrapershad Mehra, our journey spans over five decades, reflecting a steadfast commitment to quality and industry standards. Based in Marathwada, we are esteemed civil contractors with registrations in Maharashtra and Madhya Pradesh. Our legacy is built on unwavering dedication to delivering exceptional construction solutions.

"Honoring Visionaries: Ayeshakiran Township's Award-Winning Project"

Mehra Group has ventured into commercial real estate with "Ayeshakiran Township," a visionary project aligned with the "Housing for All" initiative championed by Hon. PM Shri Narendra Modi. This project comprises 266 1BHK flats, under the PMAY CLSS program, with the mission to provide quality housing for underprivileged individuals, fulfilling the dream of dignified shelter. The project has received accolades from esteemed figures such as Hon. C.M. Devendra Fadnavis during his official visit on May 13, 2017, and several other government officials. Notably, the Ayeshakiran Township Project was honored with the prestigious "Best Project in EWS Category in Maharashtra State" award by Hon. Ministry Housing Hardeepsing Puri in 2019.

Portfolio at a Glance

Explore Mehra Group's impressive portfolio of completed projects. From roads and highways to buildings and dams, our diverse range of successful endeavors showcases our commitment to excellence and innovation in the field of civil construction. Each project tells a story of quality, precision, and dedication to meeting and exceeding client expectations.
